name: ILClassificationResponse
desc: A response object that tells the system how to handle the reported communications.

items.name: init(action: ILClassificationAction)
items.desc: Creates a new response using the provided classification.

items.name: var action: ILClassificationAction
items.desc: A classification that determines what action the system takes.

items.name: var userInfo: [String : Any]?
items.desc: JSON data included in a response sent over the network.

items.name: var userString: String?
items.desc: Text included in a response sent over SMS.
